poem:
A Bright Spot  

In the heart's urgent pulse,  
swift science unfurls its wings,  
spun from whispers of code,  
a dance of hope in vials—  
where measured breaths  
stretch beyond horizons,  
and each new dawn  
paints the soft promise  
of a life lengthened,  
under the quiet canopy  
of shared persistence.
